# Telemetry Docs

## Telemetry

- [Networking telemetry](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/overview.md): Overview of networking telemetry tools in .NET.
- [Metrics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/metrics.md): Learn how to consume .NET networking Metrics.
- [Distributed tracing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/tracing.md): Learn how to consume .NET networking tracing.
- [Events](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/events.md): Learn how to consume and correlate .NET networking telemetry events.
- [Event counters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/networking/telemetry/event-counters.md): Learn how to consume .NET networking event counters.
